deals.title: Vintage Typewriter - Mechanical Keyboard Edition
deals.products: 1 Vintage Typewriter with custom mechanical switches
deals.productInfoHeader: Experience the satisfying clack of vintage typing!
deals.productInfoBody:
This beautifully restored typewriter features custom mechanical keyboard switches for the modern enthusiast.
Perfect for writers, collectors, and anyone who appreciates tactile feedback.

deals.title: Root Ventures Coffee Mug - Limited Edition
deals.products: 1 Root Ventures branded ceramic coffee mug
deals.productInfoHeader: Start your day with Root Ventures!
deals.productInfoBody:
This premium ceramic mug features our logo and is perfect for your morning coffee or afternoon tea.
Dishwasher safe and made to last.

deals.title: Deep Tech T-Shirt - Engineers Unite
deals.products: 1 Deep Tech themed t-shirt, various sizes available
deals.productInfoBody:
Soft cotton blend t-shirt with a subtle deep tech design.
Available in multiple sizes and colors.
Machine washable.

deals.title: Root Ventures Hoodie - Cozy Coding Edition
deals.products: 1 Root Ventures hoodie, perfect for late-night coding sessions
deals.productInfoBody:
Premium hoodie with Root Ventures branding.
Soft fleece lining, adjustable hood, and kangaroo pocket.
Perfect for those long debugging sessions.
